data.title: Staunton VA Clinic
data.meta_description: Get address and hours, parking and transportation information, and health services offered at Staunton VA Clinic.
data.text:
Van services for Veterans

DAV vans are currently unavailable

Non-DAV van services

Many localities in the region provide other van services to Veterans.

Learn more about DAV and the other van services available in your county

Shuttle service at

Mondays: A shuttle leaves at 7 a.m. from the McDonalds at 130 Lee Jackson Highway (US Route 11N), in Staunton, Virginia for Salem VAMC. The shuttle leaves Salem VAMC at 4 p.m.

Mondays: A shuttle leaves at 8 a.m. from the Burger King at 1005 North Lee Highway (US Route 60), in Lexington, Virginia for Salem VAMC. The shuttle leaves Salem VAMC at 4 p.m.

Veterans using the shuttle must schedule their appointments at the Salem VAMC to be held between 10 a.m. and 2 p.m. on Mondays to take advantage of the shuttle schedule.

Beneficiary travel

Beneficiary travel benefits include round-trip transportation from your home to the medical center, mileage reimbursement, or special mode transport.
